00020 #ifndef CLPP_DETAIL_PARAMETERS_REDUNDANCY_HPP
00021 #define CLPP_DETAIL_PARAMETERS_REDUNDANCY_HPP
00022 
00023 #include "common_checker.hpp"
00024 #include "../parameter.hpp"
00025 #include "../parameter_parts_extractor.hpp"
00026 
00029 namespace clpp {
00030 
00033 namespace detail {
00034 
00035 typedef common_checker< parameters, parameter_parts_extractor, std::string > checker;
00036 
00044 class parameters_redundancy_checker : public checker {
00045 public:
00046     parameters_redundancy_checker( const parameters&                    registered_parameters
00047                                    , const parameter_parts_extractor&   extractor
00048                                    , const std::string&                 name_value_separator ) :
00049             checker( registered_parameters, extractor, name_value_separator ) {}
00050 public:
00051     void check( const str_storage& inputed_parameters ) const {
00052         const size_t inputed_parameters_quantity = inputed_parameters.size();
00053         const size_t registered_parameters_quantity = registered_parameters.size();
00054         if ( inputed_parameters_quantity > registered_parameters_quantity ) {
00055             notify_about_parameters_redundancy( inputed_parameters_quantity, registered_parameters_quantity );
00056         } else {} 
00057     }
00058 private:
00059     void notify_about_parameters_redundancy( size_t   inputed_parameters_quantity
00060                                              , size_t registered_parameters_quantity ) const {
00061         o_stream what_happened;
00062         what_happened << lib_prefix() 
00063                       << "You inputs " << inputed_parameters_quantity << " parameters, "
00064                       << "but only " << registered_parameters_quantity << " registered!";
00065         throw std::runtime_error( what_happened.str() );
00066     }
00067 };
00068 
00069 } // namespace detail
00070 } // namespace clpp
00071 
00072 #endif // CLPP_DETAIL_PARAMETERS_REDUNDANCY_HPP
